IGCSE.text: A two-year secondary education program designed for students aged 14 to 16.

Year-1-To-9.text: First nine years of compulsory education where students study a broad range of subjects, developing foundational knowledge and skills in preparation for secondary education.

A-Level.text: A two-year advanced secondary education program that follows on from the IGCSE curriculum for students aged 16 to 18.
